summary: Adds a Bulletin Board in Whiterun, from there you can take up job requests.
descriptionHtml:
[Size=4][b]Introduction:[/b][/size]
Adds a Bulletin Board in Whiterun, from there you can take up job requests.

They\'re divided into categories, as far as you poke them off the bulletin board you can save them up and do them whenever you want.

All of them are repeatable (you might get the same one 24 hours later) except \"S\" ones which are unique and thus give you unique rewards (custom made weapons, armors, etc.)

To receive S requests you\'ll have to earn enough reputation by doing minor requests, higher is their rank, the more reputation you\'ll get.

[Size=4][b]Job list:[/b][/size]
F: 2
E: 0
D: 1
C: 3
B: 0
A: 3
S: 0

Total: 9


[Size=4][b]Uncompatibilities:[/b][/size][List]
[*]Unlimited Bookshelves
[*]Open cities
[*]Better Whiterun/Better cities and any other city editing mod
[/list]
author: Xilante
